metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7867 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
International Components for Unicode (ICU) for C/C++ before 2017-02-13 hasan out-of-bounds write caused by a heap-based buffer overflow related tothe utf8TextAccess function in common/utext.cpp and theutext_setNativeIndex* function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7867` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu55 - 55.1-7ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: icu package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.1-7ubuntu0.2').
